column1: | wsara 'sarita' stahl of tampa; loving wife
column6: passed away on june 19 at 83 years old. she was born on the isle of pines in cuba and became a proud united states citizen. she was married to the love of her life
column8: for 63 years. sara loved to dance
column10: and enjoy life. she is predeceased by her beloved parents
column11: and two sisters. she is survived by her husband
column12: harvey; her two daughters dianne stahl and esther segall; her son-in-law larry segall; and her grandchildren
column17: and jason. sara was loved by many and will be missed
column18: but lives on in all of our hearts. graveside services will be 2 pm sunday
column22: donations may be made to lifepath hospice
column29: fl; 33625. shiva will be observed sunday at the residence of esther and larry segall
column31: tampa fl. 33624 with minyan @ 7pm. david c. gross funeral homes
column32: belcher road chapel in clearwater is serving the family. online condolences there are currently no condolence messages to view. david c. gross funeral home and cremation center. phone: 727-381-4911 click to visit the david c. gross funeral home and cremation center website sara 'sarita' stahl 7/25/1931 - 06/19/2015 {1} ##loc[ok]## {1} ##loc[ok]## ##loc[cancel]## {1} ##loc[ok]## ##loc[cancel]## add. this sharing. compacthide. showadd. this
